EASTERN AIR LINES
NoRTHEAST AIRI
The air is yours. use it
to fulfill the vacation dreams of a lifetime
By using the airlines, you can go anywhere in the world
on your two weeks' vacation.
Think of what this means in terms of the dreams of a
lifetime. States, countries, continents, oceans — you can
conquer distance like magic! The airlines turn some
day into now; change long-standing hopes into reality.
Travel agents and airline ticket offices all over the
country are ready to tell you without obligation about
the most exciting vacation opportunities that have
ever been offered. A great fleet of more than a thousand
airliners is ready to take you quickly, comfortably,
reliably and economically to any state in the Union or
to any land overseas. Don't put it off until it's too
late. Start planning now to make this the vacation
you've always dreamed about!
UNITED AIRCRAFT
Corporation
EAST HARTFORD, CONNECTICUT
MANUFACTURERS OF
HAMILTON STANDARD PROPELLERS A SIKORSKY HELICOPTERS
AIR POWER IS PEACE POWER, AND THE AIRLINES ARE AN IMPORTANT FACTOR IN AMERICAN AIR POWER. UNITED AIRCRAFT SUPPLIES
HIGH- PERFORMANCE AVIATION EQUIPMENT TO EVERY LEADING AIRLINE AS WELL AS TO ALL OUR ARMED SERVICES
properties.sfomuseum:description: Advertisement promoting United Aircraft Corporation, for publication in Collier’s magazine, Saturday Evening Post, and Holiday, May - June 1949; color illustration depicting assortment of poster images for various airlines, accompanied by caption, “The air is yours ... use it to fulfill the vacation dreams of a lifetime.”
